solution_line_template: He made ${mowing_income} mowing yards, ${birthday_income} for his birthday, ${selling_income} selling items and ${odd_jobs_income} doing odd jobs so he made {mowing_income}+{birthday_income}+{selling_income}+{odd_jobs_income} = $<<{mowing_income}+{birthday_income}+{selling_income}+{odd_jobs_income}={total_income}>>{total_income}
He made ${total_income} and will save 40% so he saves {total_income}*{save_percent} = $<<{total_income}*{save_percent}={saved_amount}>>{saved_amount}
